bee-common-widget-bar.row-lg-image-text-left: 叙事 - 左对齐 XL 图像
bee-common-widget-bar.row-lg-image-text-right: 叙事 - 右对齐 XL 图像
bee-common-widget-bar.row-paragraph: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.
bee-common-widget-bar.row-sq-image-text-left: 叙事 - 方形图像Square image - Left aligned
bee-common-widget-bar.row-sq-image-text-right: 叙事 - 方形图像 - 右对齐
bee-common-widget-bar.row-text: Behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia.
bee-common-widget-bar.row-title-bullet-point: On her way she met a copy.
bee-common-widget-bar.row-title-main: RIGHT AT THE COAST OF THE SEMANTICS

bee-controller.error-loading-template: 出错了!加载消息时出错。
bee-controller.warning-loading-template: 已使用兼容模式加载您的消息 。可能无法使用某些功能。

bee-newsletter-modules-html.html: 我是新的 HTML 块。
bee-newsletter-modules-html.widget-warning-desc: 使用您自己的代码可能会影响消息的呈现方式。确保使用正确的响应式 HTML。

mailup-bee-app.prevent-close-confirm: 离开此页面后，您所作的更改将丢失！是否确实要离开此页面?

mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.description: 注意：背景图像并非与所有电子邮件程序兼容。出现不支持情况时，将使用行背景色代替。因此，请确保颜色与您的内容相适。
mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.label: 行背景图像
mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.name: 图像名称

mailup-bee-common-widgets-dynamic-image.description: 当启用“动态图像”时，URL 即为编辑器中显示的示例图像的地址。HTML 代码中将使用“动态 URL”。动态图像的大小取决于示例图像的大小，因此请准确设置示例图像的大小。
mailup-bee-common-widgets-dynamic-image.label: 动态图像

mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.fullwidth-blocked: 此图像大于容器，因此被自动设置为 '调整到宽度'。
mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.fullwidthOnMobile: 移动设备上应用全宽度
mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.label: 对齐
mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.switch-off-automatic: 关闭“自动调整图像大小”以手动调整图像大小。

mailup-common-file-manager.delete-confirm-title: 是否确实要删除此文件?

mailup-common-file-manager.error-uploading: 糟糕!上传图像时出现问题。

mailup-common-file-manager.validation-name-special-characters: 包含无效字符（不得使用字符 < > : " / \ | ?*）

mailup-common-file-manager.delete-confirm-text: Deleting the file is permanent and cannot be undone. Please carefully consider your decision before proceeding.

mailup-common-page-preview.disclaimer-description: 在各种设备上一致地显示电子邮件是一项挑战。响应式设计提供了一个解决方案。此邮件将在很多移动客户端上正确显示。不支持响应式设计时将使用桌面版本。
mailup-common-page-preview.error: 出错了!预览时出现问题。
mailup-common-page-preview.dark-mode-preview-tooltip: Dark mode support varies across email clients and devices. When enabled, the Dark Mode Preview will simulate a generic dark mode color scheme.

mailup-bee-common-widgets-id.description: The ID can be used as an internal reference in the content. Setting an ID for a module makes it available for selection in the link options. When not automatically generated, make sure to use unique identifiers.

mailup-bee-commenting.addCommentFormPlaceholderResolved: Adding a new comment will reopen the thread…

mailup-bee-carousel.first-slide-sizing-rule: First-positioned image will determine the aspect of the carousel. The following images will adapt their ratio to the carousel.

mailup-bee-head-meta-favicon.name: Favicon
mailup-bee-head-meta-favicon.label-help: Submit an image (PNG, JPG, GIF). For an optimal result, the image should be at least {{suggestedDimensions}}.

mailup-bee-rows-management.confirm: Do you want to delete the row?

mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-vid.label: Row background video
mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-vid.description: Some mobile devices will only display the first frame of background videos

error.generic: There is a problem with this video. Verify your URL or try again later
error.vimeo-not-found: This Vimeo Video is not available
error.vimeo-not-embeddable: This Vimeo Video doesn't allow embedding. Remove embedding restriction to display it correctly
error.youtube-not-embeddable: This YouTube Video cannot be embedded. Remove embedding restriction to display it correctly
error.youtube-private: The YouTube Video is private. Change the video permissions to embed it
error.youtube-not-found: This YouTube Video is not available

mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-body-title: Some examples of how you can use the AI Assistant for your paragraph
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-example:
• Write the body copy for a promotional email with [your subject line].
  • Compose a message to engage with followers and spark a conversation about a trending topic in [your industry].
  • Write an email to re-engage inactive users and encourage them to start using [your platform] again.
  • Generate an invite for a webinar about [your topic].
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-body-subtitle: Generate new content and add it to your paragraph
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-header-title: AI Assistant can help you write faster and more effectively
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.placeholder: What would you like to write about?
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.pin-label: You are working on AI with your {module} module
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-heading-title: Some examples of how you can use the AI Assistant for your title
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-heading-subtitle: Generate new content and add it in your title
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-heading-example:
• Craft a title that showcases how [Address Pain Point] with [Product/Service] - [Number] [Benefits/Features] can boost your conversions.
  • Compose a headline that shares insights on [Event/Webinar/Challenge] and the steps to take in order to [Achieve Desired Outcome].
  • Create a title promoting [Exclusive Offer/Discount] with a compelling CTA to [Take Action Now/Claim Yours Today].
  • Formulate a title that highlights the [Urgent/Exclusive Offer] - [Discount/Deal] that will [Expire Soon/Terminate Today].
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-list-title: Some examples of how you can use the AI assistant for your list
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-list-subtitle: Generate new content and add it in your list
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-list-example:
• Describe how [Product/Service] can help your business achieve [specific goal] and write about its advantages.
  • Provide answers to common questions that people have about our [Product/Service], and write them in a clear and concise way.
  • Showcase the added value of upgrading to our premium version of [Product/Service], and write about the benefits that users can enjoy.
  • Explore the various ways in which our [Product/Service] can be utilized in [Industry], and write about the potential use cases that customers may find helpful.
  • Demonstrate how our [Product/Service] is uniquely suited to [Target Audience], and write about the advantages that it offers specifically to this group.
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-button-title: Some examples of how you can use the AI Assistant for your button
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-button-subtitle: Generate new content and add it in your button
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-button-example:
• Generate a CTA for lead magnets to improve conversion rates.
  • Generate a CTA suggestion for cart abandonment emails.
  • Create a title promoting [Exclusive Offer/Discount] with a compelling CTA to [Take Action Now/Claim Yours Today].
  • Generate a personalized CTA for cross-selling [your service] and upselling [your products].
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-correct-grammar: Correct grammar mistakes in the content
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-convert-third-person: Convert the content to the third person without changing the format
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-adjust-tone: Make it [tone] without changing the format
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-correct-grammar-list: Correct grammar mistakes and return the content
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-capitalize-all-words: Capitalize the first letter of each word

mailup-common-multi-language.meta-lang-disclaimer: This option is disabled because you are working on a multi-language template. The Meta language property is automatically set according to the current language of the template.

common-stage.not-supported-module-warning-message: This text cannot be translated. Please replace it with either the paragraph or title for multilanguage support.
